# HUD::END_TEXT_COMMAND_THEFEED_POST_AWARD

## Summary
Displays the Award component

## Parameters
* **STRING** tXD: Award texture dictionary
* **STRING** tXN: Award texture name
* **INT** xP: Award xp
* **HUD_COLOURS** awardColour: Award colour
* **STRING** title = null:
Award title (i.e.
"Medal" or "Award")

## Returns
* **INT**: A unique id which can be used to manipulate the item while on screen.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Shows an "award" notification above the minimap, example: https://i.imgur.com/e2DNaKX.png
Example:

HUD::BEGIN_TEXT_COMMAND_THEFEED_POST("HUNT");
HUD::END_TEXT_COMMAND_THEFEED_POST_AWARD("Hunting", "Hunting_Gold_128", 0, 109, "HUD_MED_UNLKED");
